Title: Blind Them!
Description:
Horde sunwalkers! We saw one of their scouts patrolling by the oubliette not long before you arrived.

I don't know how he got here but I can guarantee you he isn't alone. They never are.

Kill the sunwalker scout before he reports our position.
CompletionText: Did you find the tauren scout? Our presence must be kept a secret. The horde can NOT know we are here.
RewardText:
Sunwalkers are not to be trusted. They are the most militant branch of the tauren armies within the horde.

Thank you for your help in this, $p. Please accept this token as a reward.
